body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-70 tribe-no-js tribe-bar-is-disabled

div.p: Now Enrolling Grades K-8 in Cleveland, Ohio

div.h1: Welcome To Hope Academy – Northcoast Campus
div.p: Our rigorous academic program exceeds Ohio state standards to prepare students for college and career. We observe an extended school day and extended school year. We exceed the 920 hours per school year required by the Ohio Department of Education in order to maximize learning time. Hope Academy Northcoast is a tuition-free, community school of choice for grades K–8. We are AdvancED Accredited.

h2.a: Last Day of School for Students – End of 4th Quarter

img.span: Newsletter 2018 Click here to read all about what's going on at Hope Academy Northcoast!

div.span:
Thank you for choosing Hope Academy Northcoast
for your child and allowing us to serve your family.
To begin the enrollment process, please click below.

div.class: pum pum-overlay pum-theme-1378 pum-theme-default-theme popmake-overlay pum-overlay-disabled auto_open click_open
pum-container popmake theme-1378 pum-responsive pum-responsive-small responsive size-small

div.p: Our highest priority is to keep all scholars, staff, families, and community members safe as we navigate these difficult times.

div.class: pum pum-overlay pum-theme-1378 pum-theme-default-theme popmake-overlay pum-overlay-disabled auto_open click_open
pum-container popmake theme-1378 pum-responsive pum-responsive-medium responsive size-medium

div.p: Our summer office hours are Mon-Fri 7:30am-2pm or by appointment. We will be closed 7/1-7/5. Our regular office hours will resume the first day of school: 8/12/19.

a.strong: Click Here to Schedule a Tour
